item.description:
Meet at my home for games at 7 pm, and call me if you need directions or have questions.  Three meetup groups are invited, so there should be a good crowd!  I'll provide some snacks, but BYOB and more munchies if you can!

Due to minimal response, I think I will forego the leaf change excursion I was hoping to make if others wanted to climb aboard my van for a day trip.  Plus, leaves are no where near peak yet!  Sunday may be in the 80's!

Marion  860-477-0335

group.name: The NorthEast Connecticut Friends Meetup Group

item.name: play games!!! Multi-group event! Twister and more!
